title: COVID-19 Coronavirus - Symptoms
data:
• There’s currently no vaccine to prevent coronavirus
    disease (COVID-19).
• If you develop a fever, cough, and have difficulty
    breathing, promptly seek medical care.
• Call in advance and tell your health provider as
    soon as possible for medical advice.

title: The Coronavirus Explained & What You Should Do
Muskurayega India | Official Video | An initiative by Jjust Music and Cape of Good Films
What can people do to protect themselves and others from getting the new coronavirus?
Do’s
dataTitle: Wear face masks and use hand gloves
Cover your face while sneezing or coughing

title: Don’ts
dataTitle: Do not touch face and mouth
Do not sneeze without covering your mouth

title: Facts about Coronavirus
data:
• Spreads through air and direct contact with infected
   people
• Infects humans of all ages and not only a particular age
    group
• Takes atleast 10-14 days to show its symptoms
• Does not affect animals
• Can also be transmitted in areas with hot and humid
    climates

title: Myths
data:
• Exposing yourself to the sun or to temperatures higher
    than 25º C prevents from corona virus infection
• Drinking alcohol protects you against the corona virus
• Cats and dogs spreads corona virus
• Antibiotics can kill corona virus
• The outbreak began because people drank bat soup
